title: Online Learning Space Design: Effective Strategies for Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Learning design must consider spatiotemporal flexibility in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, with demand for job-linked social sector content for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more principles of optimized learning space design in mobile environments.
Learners can develop self-directed learning plans utilizing microlearning content.
Learners can propose two or more practical strategies to overcome spatial constraints in online learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
